sentence.Network_en: Discrimination by employers on the grounds of race and nationality was illegal.
sentence.Network_cn: 雇主以种族或国籍为由歧视员工是非法的。

sentence.Network_en: Asked his nationality, he said British.
sentence.Network_cn: 被问及国籍时，他说是英国。

sentence.Network_en: Aggression by one nationality against another often leads to war.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个国家对另一国家的挑衅经常会道致战争.

族群性，也泛称民族性(nationality)，是民族的属性或独特特征，通过诸如相同的语言、血缘、习俗和宗教体现出来。民族性具有动态 …
an emblem flown as a symbol of nationality .一个飘动的代表国籍的象征。
...越了“单一民族国家”(nationality)，“多民族国家”(nationalities)，“国家联合体”(如欧共体、独联体等)。

means.word_mean: 民族主义,爱国主义,民族精神

entry.def: If you have the nationality of a particular country, you were born there or have the legal right to be a citizen.

example.ex: Asked his nationality, he said British...
example.tran: 被问及国籍时，他说是英国。

example.ex: The crew are of different nationalities and have no common language.
example.tran: 船员来自不同国家，语言不通。

entry.tran: (尤指未建立独立国家的)民族
entry.def: You can refer to people who have the same racial origins as a nationality, especially when they do not have their own independent country.

example.tran: 组成埃塞俄比亚的众多民族

means.word_mean: 1. the status of belonging to a particular nation by birth or naturalization

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同词源的,同类的;同种的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cog同+nat出生的,本土的+e→同生的
in进+nat出生的,本土的+e→与出生一起进来→天赋的
nat出生的,本土的+al……的→adj.出生的
natal[adj.出生的]+ity表名词→n.出生率,出生
nat出生的,本土的+ion表名词→出生之处
nation民族,国家+ality表名词→n.国籍,民族
nat本土的+ive人→n.本地人,本国人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 自然界,大自然;性质,本性,天性
stems_affixes.word_buile: nat出生的,本土的+ure表名词→出生状态→天性
neo新+nat出生的,本土的+e→新出生
hospit客人+ality表性质→n.好客,殷勤,款待
liber自由+ality状态,性质→n.慷慨,心胸开阔
nation民族,国家+ality状态,性质→n.国籍,民族

sentences.en: She lives in France but has British nationality.
sentences.cn: 她住在法国但拥有英国国籍。

sentences.en: A lot of national parks lie in the areas inhabited by minority nationality people.
sentences.cn: 许多国家公园都位于少数民族聚居的地方。

jushi.english: She lives in France but has British nationality.
jushi.chinese: 她住在法国但属英国国籍。

jushi.english: It was a year of unrest among the country's many nationalities.
jushi.chinese: 对于那个国家的许多民族而言那是不平静的一年。

jushi.english: A lot of national parks lie in the areas inhabited by minority nationality people.
jushi.chinese: 许多国家公园都位于少数民族聚居的地方。
